**Reading file from ftp.imr.no server**
Windows: read.csv("//ftp.imr.no/yourfolder1/yourfolrder2/yourfile.ext") 
MAC: read.csv("/Volumes/ftp.imr.no/yourfolder1/yourfolrder2/yourfile.ext")
